nodes.text: Winter Fete is a holiday in the Tapani sector. It was originally marked the winter equinox on the planet of Pelagon. The settlers there were the first to celebrate Winter Fete, and when they began settling other planets in the sector, the holiday went with them. Over time, the holiday was modified to coincide with Coruscant's Fete Week. In the current Tapani local calendar, Winter Fete fell on the very last week of the year, following the month of Welona.
